subject: Baseball
Women and Girls
Race and Ethnicity
lead_paragraph: Mary Frances Veeck and Wyonella Smith, both 91, share a long friendship nurtured over the years by baseball and their husbands who are honored in the Hall of Fame: Bill Veeck and Wendell Smith.
snippet: Mary Frances Veeck and Wyonella Smith, both 91, share a long friendship nurtured over the years by baseball and their husbands who are honored in the Hall of Fame: Bill Veeck and Wendell Smith.
